verbose_text: miR-449 was predicted to target Sirt1 mRNA by online database microRNA.org-Targets and Expression (www.microrna.org), and some studies have indicated Sirt1 mRNA to be a direct target for miR-449 [XREF_BIBR], so the protein expression of SIRT1 and its downstream p53 and BAX was detected by Western blot analysis (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of SIRT1 and its downstream p53
